title: Greatness
content:
Our Dearest Captain {{captainName}}:

As The Bard once said, "Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them."

While we believe it may be too early in the history of Adalia to determine which version of greatness applies to you, we hope that you will gladly accept the greatness that we are thrusting upon you at the moment. As we were quite impressed with your skills regarding your most recent trade, we have sent your crew {{swayAmount}} SWAY. No need to thank us. Just be sure to remember who your friends are.

Cordially,

The Merchants of Venus
